title: House narrowly passes Trump's megabill in major victory for Republicans
summary: President Donald Trump worked the phones late into the night to help House Republican leadership deliver his second-term policy agenda.

title: Microsoft layoffs hit 830 workers in home state of Washington
summary: The 830 Microsoft employees who lost their jobs in Washington included cloud solution architects, game designers and lawyers.

title: UK Supreme Court rules F-35 parts sale to Israel is legal
summary: The judges ruled that blocking the export was the prerogative of the executive, which had warned against undermining U.S. trust in Britain

title: Escape Room
summary: Zhou Zhang and Kevin Curry present a monumental riddle in their Sunday puzzle debut.

title: Camp Mystic Parents Endure Agonizing Wait for Their Missing Children
summary: Stories of rescues have begun trickling out, but 27 children remain unaccounted for from a storied camp on the Guadalupe River in Texas Hill Country.
